creator: yellow_belly2000@hotmail.com
text:
If a Windows 2000/2003 FTP Site uses MS-DOS style listing, an FTP GET does not
work. It connects to the FTP site OK, but fails to retrieve anything.

Please supply more details.  What version of Ant was this reported with?  What
version of the jakarta-commons-net library were you using?  This sounds like
something that should have been fixed if you were using Ant >=1.6.2 and
Jakarta-commons Net >= 1.2.2.
creator: scohen@apache.org
yellow_belly2000@hotmail.com
text:
You are right - this has been fixed using more recent versions of Ant and 
Jakarta Commons Net.

Sorry to have wasted your time.
